decision_conditions: The proposed erection of a rear dormer roof extension and the installation of 2no. rooflights falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension
